vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
περιβόλ-αιον, τό,
(περιβάλλω) that which is thrown round, covering, θανάτου περιβόλαια corpse-clothes, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; σαρκὸς π. ἡβῶντα youthful incasements of flesh, i.e. youth, manhood,[Refs 1st c.BC+]; frequently in [LXX]; woman's headgear, [NT]; covering for the feet, [Refs 1st c.AD+]; chariot-cover, [Refs]; bedcover, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; padding, περιβόλαια σπληνῶν [Refs].381; dressing-gown, warm wrap, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__II ={περίβολος} 11.2, [Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
covering, robe
that which is thrown around, any one, clothing, covering; a cloak, robe Heb. 1:12; a covering, 1Cor. 11:15*

vocabInfos._zh_Definition: (用以遮盖身体的衣物) 袍子, 外套, 遮盖物 (林前 11:15; 来 1:12)
